title: Connectivity, Flexibility and Integration in the Automated Lab - Technology Networks
summary: Agilent's new NGS Bravo NGS Automated Liquid Handling Platform with On-Deck Thermal Cycler (ODTC) and AssayMAP Bravo Protein Sample Prep Workbench 4.0 were launched at SLAS 2023. The NGS Bravo extends walkaway time by 250%, while the AssayMAP Bravo combines precision liquid flow control, microchromatography cartridges, and novel software. Sustainability is a focus for Agilent, with ongoing projects surrounding automation consumables and ACT accreditations.
